name: The Knot
description:
The Endless Knot. The eternal continuum of mind.

In 'The Knot' you play as your zoomorphised conscience who roams across the varying facets of your mind searching for inner peace. You will encounter many colourful characters on your journey. How you interact with them is up to you.

This was our first project working together and man was it a lot of fun :D

Also, a heads up... the game only handles one play through as of the time of submission.. so dont go crazy looping and wondering what the hell is going on :P

Created by:

  • Tristan Whitfield ( Music / Art )
  • Jeremy Craig ( Code / Art )
  • Jena Nielsen ( Art )

Created with LÖVE
